thread.section_title: Auto Europe Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe Canada | autoeurope.ca
thread.title: Dan
thread.title_full: Auto Europe Canada reviewed by Dan

author: Dan
title: Dan
text: We've rented through Autoeurope twice so far: Italy in 2013 and Greece in 2016 - no issues, everything went smooth. I like the idea of Auto Europe to rent with insurance right away, rather then figuring it all out on arrival. This way - no surprises and everything is transparent. Just booked another car rental for our France trip - looking forward!
